verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: marked] [ARG1: the National Day of Prayer] [ARGM-MNR: by signing an executive order aimed at helping faith - based groups gain “ equal access to government funding ” and to ensure they have “ equal right to exercise ” their religious beliefs] .
